index.title: What do we want to achieve?

card1.title: Stay positive
card1.content: Nowadays it's necessary to maintain a sports routine to stay positive and want to continue doing physical activity

card2.title: Stay motivated
card2.content: With a community that wants to help not only by sharing exercise routines of all kinds but also giving encouragement

card3.title: Be healthy
card3.content: Thanks to the community and the routines you will stay healthy and improve your physical condition over time

card4.title: Routines
card4.content: Thanks to the community itself and you will have full access to routines and you can do as many as you want

card5.title: Variety
card5.content: Since we all contribute the variety of routines it's wide, separated by categorization and described

card6.title: compromises
card6.content: This app does not mark any type of goal just to stay healthy and in motion by doing routines

card7.title: decide
card7.content: Here you are the one who marks what you want to do, routines without any coach or obligations

manager.explain: On this screen you can add, modify and delete your own routines

title.error: This field is required and maximum 40 characters

type.info: Choose one if your routine is of time or repetitions
